subject: Soccer
organizations: New York City Football Club (Soccer Team)
lead_paragraph: Soccer fans wearing a new shade of blue mixed with familiar baseball sights and sounds at Yankee Stadium as N.Y.C.F.C. beat New England in its first home game.
snippet: Soccer fans wearing a new shade of blue mixed with familiar baseball sights and sounds at Yankee Stadium as N.Y.C.F.C. beat New England in its first home game.
